title: The Taming of Serge Dumont
description: Serge Dumont, vampire latent, has never met a woman who wasn't his for the taking-until he meets Derri Morgan. One look at the sexy, beautiful defense attorney and it's bloodlust at first sight for Serge. Undaunted, and confident of his attraction to the opposite sex, Serge sets out to capture his prize...
author: Marilyn Lee
